group_1.textRight: After you two left the village,
we spoke with the elder about@reconsidering the custom.
Simply put, it didn't work.

group_1.textLeft: Unbelievable...even the words@of a Diviner didn't do it...

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry we couldn't help you...

group_1.textLeft: I don't want to make it sound like@I'm defending the elder here...
But I didn't detect any malice from him.
I think he sincerely believes you must@obey the custom.

group_1.textRight: By adhering to tradition,
the villagers believe it will protect their@children from malicious outsiders...

group_1.textLeft: But even so, there are only a few cases@where that's ever happened, yes?
Even if the custom was put in place to@maintain the Diviner system,
it's strange that it would endure even without@having a Diviner for such a long time...
I think there must have been another@reason behind it.

group_1.textRight: If they've been lying about divine retribution@in order to keep the tradition alive...
...there must be something the village@wants to protect.
Is there any way we can figure out@what exactly that is?
If it has anything to do with the history@of the Tokime Clan,
we could ask your mom back at home.@She might know!

group_1.textLeft: I'll call her and see if our family has@any records on this place.

group_1.textRight: That would be excellent. Thank you.
Now we just need to find the Diviner's ship.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, we gotta figure out why it sank.
So...how do we go 'bout doing that?

group_1.textRight: I'd like to go out to the sea while@there's still light out,
but we don't have a boat...
I can ask my dad if he can send out@a fishing boat.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, your father is a fisherman?

group_1.textRight: Yeah. Even if he can't take us all the way@out there, I think we can get pretty close.
If I had known it would be that easy,
I would have asked your father in@the first place!
[chara:101701:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I'm so excited - we can finally begin@our treasure hunt...!
I'm just kidding.
Even someone like me will help a girl with@her love problems as best she can.
Let's do our best to find that sunken ship,@alright?

group_1.textLeft: We gotta find out the truth...
...so Miyo and the others at@the village can live freely!
